snippet.title: Plastomorphosis - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Take a look at the latest trailer for the upcoming horror game, Plastomorphosis. Evacuated from his hometown due to the dangerous bursts of dark energy, the ordinary citizen is trying to overcome and survive a series of events in a new reality, where living as a human being is not possible anymore. 3rd-person horror with fixed camera angles and retro-styled graphics. Plastomorphosis is coming to PC via Steam in 2024.
